dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3274 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4567 Rockbridge Road in Pine Lake, Georgia, as the “Francis Manuel Ortega Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of Georgia (for himself, Mr. Carter of Georgia, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Mr. Westmoreland, Mr. Lewis, Mr. Tom Price of Georgia, Mr. Woodall, Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia, Mr. Collins of Georgia, Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Allen, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, and Mr. Graves of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4567 Rockbridge Road in Pine Lake, Georgia, as the Francis Manuel Ortega Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4567 Rockbridge Road in Pine Lake, Georgia, shall be known and designated as the Francis Manuel Ortega Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Francis Manuel Ortega Post Office.
